title: List of all Android bluetooth  example libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android bluetooth  example libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-bluetooth-serial
repoList.description: A library for Android to simplify basic serial communication over Bluetooth, for example when communicating with Arduinos.

repoList.name: AndroidSerialPort
repoList.description: A library and example app to use serial port or Bluetooth SPP on Android

repoList.name: abandoned-BTConApp
repoList.description: Android p2p Library, using Wifi Direct for discovery, and Bluetooth for Communications. Includes example app for usage

repoList.name: Requirements
repoList.description: Small utility library for Android to evaluate requirements in order for some action to proceed. For example: network connection, permissions (API 23), system services (location, bluetooth, ...), etc.

repoList.name: BluetoothCommunicatorExample
repoList.description: Example bluetooth chat app using Bluetooth LE library to communicate between android devices

repoList.name: NymiBasicExample
repoList.description: Nymi Basic Example for band provision.   As adapted from NymiSDK-Android-2.0-Build38.  Configured with BlueTooth libraries so that interface to Nymi devices instead of the Nymulator

repoList.name: juma-android-sdk-lite
repoList.description: JUMA.IO - This is the Bluetooth Smart 4.0 SDK for Android applications combined with juma-embedded-sdk. It includs library, headers and a debug tool as open source example. This Bluetooth BLE SDK supports most of Android4.3+ phones/pads at the moment.
